wikipedia_page.main: Rodney McCutcheon is an international lawn and indoor bowler born on 3 April 1962.Rodney was born in Bangor, County Down and as a schoolboy first played on the short mats. In 1982 he defeated Tony Allcock in the British Isles Under-25 singles championship. His best moments came in the 1988 World Outdoor Bowls Championship when he struck Gold in the fours and in the 1990 Commonwealth Games when he helped Northern Ireland secure the silver.
